name: aircraft_scatter_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool aircraftscatter.
Tool description: Aircraft Scatter API by ADSBexchange.com
API description: Fetch aircraft data above 10,000 feet within 1000 kilometers from the specified latitude and longitude.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate for the center point of the search radius.

lon.description: Longitude coordinate for the center point of the search radius.
